issue.title: [Integration][C++] Upgrade all CI to use C++14
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12947](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12947). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently there is a CI step **rstudio/r-base:4.0-centos7** 
which runs GCC 4.8.1 (C++11). 

In the ML it was agreed that arrow would switch to >=C++14. Therefore, the CI step needs to be upgraded to a later GCC.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12947?focusedCommentId=17356581) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
I don't know that it's accurate to say that it was agreed to increase the minimum C++ standard to 14 or 17. Folks are exploring it but I don't think a decision was reached.
